This extraordinary 5-bedroom fully detached house, priced at ₦1.6 billion, is the ultimate symbol of luxury and modern living. Built to cater to the elite, every aspect of this home speaks to refined taste and exclusivity. Opulent Design & Spacious Interiors : As you step into this newly built residence, you’re welcomed by an expansive, light-filled living space, adorned with stunning POP ceilings and recessed LED lighting that bathes the interiors in a warm, modern glow. Each of the five ensuite bedrooms offers spacious comfort, meticulously finished with high-quality materials and thoughtful design touches. Dual Kitchens – Wet & Dry : The house boasts two fully fitted kitchens—one wet and one dry—equipped with state-of-the-art appliances. Whether you’re preparing everyday meals or indulging in gourmet cooking, these kitchens are designed to meet all your culinary needs, offering both functionality and luxury. Elevated Living Spaces : Entertain guests in the grand dining area, illuminated by elegant chandeliers, or retreat to the family lounge for intimate gatherings. The balconies provide a perfect space for enjoying serene views of the estate, while the secure environment ensures peace of mind. Exclusive Outdoor & Relaxation Features : Step outside and immerse yourself in the luxurious lifestyle this home offers. The beautifully designed swimming pool invites you to unwind and relax. The stamped concrete floors and interlocked streets further accentuate the refined look of the outdoor spaces. The home also includes a Boys’ Quarters (BQ), providing versatile accommodation for staff or guests. Why This Property is Worth ₦1.6 Billion : Premium Kitchens : Both dry and wet kitchens, fully fitted with high-end appliances. Swimming Pool : A private pool for ultimate relaxation and entertainment. Spacious Luxury : Five ensuite bedrooms and multiple living areas ensure that every family member has their own space. Prime Location : Situated in the prestigious Osapa Lekki, with easy access to top schools, shopping malls, and entertainment hubs. Impeccable Finishes : POP ceilings, recessed lighting, and luxurious materials throughout offer a truly premium living experience. Key Attractions : Prime, secure estate with 24-hour security Close proximity to shopping centers, schools, and recreation areas Prestigious neighborhood known for its exclusivity and tranquility This property is more than just a home; it’s a lifestyle statement for those who value the finest things in life. Don’t miss the opportunity to own this magnificent residence in one of Lagos’ most desirable locations. Perfectly positioned in a prime location, this development offers modern 2-bedroom apartments designed for both stylish living and profitable shortlet investment. With Lekki Phase 1 ranking as the second most sought-after area for shortlets in Lagos , owning a home here is more than a lifestyle choice—it’s a smart investment move. Why Brum Height 7 Stands Out This project delivers a rare mix of cutting-edge design, everyday comfort, and world-class amenities . From its sleek architecture to its modern interiors, every detail has been carefully curated. Prime location with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi Perfect for investors with rising shortlet demand Contemporary finishes and functional layouts Smart home features for convenience and security Payment Options Made Simple Outright Purchase – ₦250M 6-Month Plan – ₦280M (Pay 20% and spread balance till December 2025) Off-Plan Purchase Available – Delivery by November 2025 Legal Title Each apartment comes with Governor’s Consent , guaranteeing secure ownership. A Home & Investment in One Whether you’re buying to live in or to rent out as a shortlet, Brum Height 7 offers the best of both worlds. Its prime Lekki Phase 1 location , coupled with high-quality construction and thoughtful design, ensures strong long-term value. This isn’t just an apartment—it’s a lifestyle opportunity in the heart of Lagos. description: Description Brum Height 7 – 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 Brum Height 7 is a landmark development in Lekki Phase 1 , one of Lagos’ most prestigious and in-demand neighborhoods. Perfectly positioned in a prime location, this development offers modern 2-bedroom apartments designed for both stylish living and profitable shortlet investment. With Lekki Phase 1 ranking as the second most sought-after area for shortlets in Lagos , owning a home here is more than a lifestyle choice—it’s a smart investment move. Why Brum Height 7 Stands Out This project delivers a rare mix of cutting-edge design, everyday comfort, and world-class amenities . From its sleek architecture to its modern interiors, every detail has been carefully curated. Prime location with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi Perfect for investors with rising shortlet demand Contemporary finishes and functional layouts Smart home features for convenience and security Payment Options Made Simple Outright Purchase – ₦250M 6-Month Plan – ₦280M (Pay 20% and spread balance till December 2025) Off-Plan Purchase Available – Delivery by November 2025 Legal Title Each apartment comes with Governor’s Consent , guaranteeing secure ownership. A Home & Investment in One Whether you’re buying to live in or to rent out as a shortlet, Brum Height 7 offers the best of both worlds. Its prime Lekki Phase 1 location , coupled with high-quality construction and thoughtful design, ensures strong long-term value. This isn’t just an apartment—it’s a lifestyle opportunity in the heart of Lagos. Location Advantages 5 minutes to Victoria Island 10 minutes to Ikoyi Close to shopping malls, restaurants, lounges, and business hubs

Newly built and move-in ready, it is designed for families and individuals who value space, privacy, and functionality. From the moment you arrive, the home’s modern architecture and clean finishing stand out. Inside, the living area features POP ceilings , recessed LED lighting , and an open layout that flows naturally from one space to another. AFFORDABLE LUXURY AFFORDABLE prestine luxury elegant Spacious Bedrooms and Premium Finishes All five bedrooms are ensuite , giving each family member or guest privacy and comfort. The rooms come with built-in closets , balconies , and fitted bathrooms that combine style with practicality. Large windows bring in natural light, making every room feel airy and inviting. Whether it’s the primary suite or guest rooms, each space has been carefully designed to enhance modern living. Fully Fitted Kitchen & Modern Living Spaces The kitchen is fully fitted with premium cabinetry, sleek countertops, and ample storage. It’s the perfect space for both everyday cooking and hosting. The home also features multiple living areas, ensuring enough room for relaxation, entertaining, and family moments. Amenities That Elevate Your Lifestyle This property is equipped with essentials that guarantee everyday convenience: Reliable 24/7 power supply Clean portable water system Well-paved access roads Secure environment for peace of mind Prime Chevron Toll Location Located in Chevron Toll, Lekki , this home places you close to top schools, shopping malls, restaurants, and business hubs. With quick access to Lekki Phase 1, Victoria Island, and Ikoyi, commuting is easy and convenient. description: Description I Ikoyi Luxury Apartment – A New Benchmark for City Living Step inside this newly built Ikoyi luxury apartment, a 5-bedroom, 5.5-bath residence designed for those who value elegance, technology, and comfort. Located in the heart of Lagos’ most prestigious district, this home offers unmatched privacy, security, and style. Inside the Ikoyi Luxury Apartment – Spaces That Inspire Every room in this residence is thoughtfully crafted. All five bedrooms are ensuite, featuring fitted wardrobes, spa-inspired bathrooms, and balconies that open to serene city views. POP ceilings, recessed LED lighting, and premium finishes create a warm yet sophisticated ambiance. Gourmet Living – The Kitchen and Dining Experience The fully fitted kitchen comes with modern appliances, ample storage, and sleek finishes perfect for both everyday meals and entertaining guests. The open plan flows effortlessly into the dining and living areas, making hosting a joy. Luxury Amenities in This Ikoyi Luxury Apartment Enjoy a home that’s as functional as it is beautiful: Sauna for relaxation Fully equipped gym Elevator access to all levels Designer swimming pool Stylish lobby to welcome guests Reliable power supply and portable water system The Lifestyle Only an Ikoyi Luxury Apartment Can Offer Beyond the walls, you’re surrounded by high-end shopping, fine dining, and the cultural heartbeat of Lagos. This property offers both a prime location and a secure investment in one of Africa’s most valuable real estate markets. Why This Ikoyi Luxury Apartment is Worth Your Attention Price is available upon request, reflecting the exclusivity of the offering. Whether you’re relocating, upgrading, or expanding your portfolio, this residence delivers the features, location, and prestige discerning buyers demand. Schedule a Private Viewing of This Ikoyi Luxury Apartment Experience elite living for yourself. Contact Eden Oasis to book your private showing today. Book Your Exclusive Tour Ready to experienc

Celebrate a Dad. Live the Urban Nest Lifestyle. Looking for a sleek and spacious 2-bedroom apartment in Lekki Peninsula II with flexible payment options? Welcome to Urban Nest —a thoughtfully designed residential development built for modern living, long-term comfort, and great investment value. For a limited time, you can secure your unit with just ₦10 million and spread your balance over 12 months interest-free . Plus, when you call or send the code HOME4DAD , you unlock a Father’s Day bonus offer exclusive to early buyers. Why Choose Urban Nest? Urban Nest is more than a home—it’s a smart lifestyle choice. Each 2-bedroom apartment is designed for functionality, privacy, and comfort. All rooms are en-suite , and the layout flows beautifully between spaces. The fitted kitchen and modern bathroom offer style and usability, while the living area is ideal for both quiet evenings and hosting friends. Outside your door, the estate is loaded with lifestyle features including: A swimming pool for leisure and fitness A well-equipped gym Treated water system Stable power supply Professional security for peace of mind Stamped concrete flooring and paved access roads Whether you’re a first-time buyer, investor, or upgrading your living space, Urban Nest delivers value in one of Lekki’s fastest-growing residential zones. ricing & Payment Plan Price: ₦80 million Initial Deposit: ₦10 million Payment Plan: Up to 12 months (interest-free) Limited-Time Offer Celebrate Father’s Day the smart way. Send the code HOME4DAD when you call to claim your special bonus. Ready to see it in person? Book a private tour today or explore more high-end homes in Osapa and Lekki . description: Description Own a Home. Celebrate a Dad. Live the Urban Nest Lifestyle. Looking for a sleek and spacious 2-bedroom apartment in Lekki Peninsula II with flexible payment options? Welcome to Urban Nest —a thoughtfully designed residential development built for modern living, long-term comfort, and great investment value. For a limited time, you can secure your unit with just ₦10 million and spread your balance over 12 months interest-free . Plus, when you call or send the code HOME4DAD , you unlock a Father’s Day bonus offer exclusive to early buyers. Why Choose Urban Nest? Urban Nest is more than a home—it’s a smart lifestyle choice. Each 2-bedroom apartment is designed for functionality, privacy, and comfort. All rooms are en-suite , and the layout flows beautifully between spaces. The fitted kitchen and modern bathroom offer style and usability, while the living area is ideal for both quiet evenings and hosting friends. Outside your door, the estate is loaded with lifestyle features including: A swimming pool for leisure and fitness A well-equipped gym Treated water system Stable power supply Professional security for peace of mind Stamped concrete flooring and paved access roads Whether you’re a first-time buyer, investor, or upgrading your living space, Urban Nest delivers value in one of Lekki’s fastest-growing residential zones. ricing & Payment Plan Price: ₦80 million Initial Deposit: ₦10 million Payment Plan: Up to 12 months (interest-free) Limited-Time Offer Celebrate Father’s Day the smart way. Send the code HOME4DAD when you call to claim your special bonus. Ready to see it in person? Book a private tour today or explore more high-end homes in Osapa and Lekki . land_size: 5-Bedroom Smart Home for Sale in Lagos - Eden Oasis Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast +2348092949777 Description Address Features Video Details Floor Plans Schedule a Tour Contact Reviews Similar Listings Home Fully Detached Duplex 5-Bedroom Smart Home for Sale in Lagos WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email 5-Bedroom Smart Home for Sale in Lagos Price available upon request Featured For Sale New Listing Hot Offer Ikate Lekki, Lagos 34 31 More Fully Detached Duplex Property Type 5 Bedrooms 5.5 Bathrooms 800SQM 2025 Year Built WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email Featured For Sale New Listing Hot Offer 5-Bedroom Smart Home for Sale in Lagos Ikate Lekki, Lagos Price available upon request Description Welcome to Your 5-Bedroom Smart Home in Lagos This 5-bedroom smart home blends modern living with comfort and wellness. Located in a serene residential environment, it was built for those who value space, smart features, and thoughtful design. The main living area is a visual delight. It greets you with soaring ceilings , customized lighting , and a tranquil indoor water fountain . Right from the entrance, the space feels warm and peaceful. Sleek Interiors, Functional Layouts The open-concept design leads you into a stylish wet and dry kitchen , fully equipped with premium appliances , custom cabinetry , and elegant countertops. Whether you’re entertaining or preparing a quiet meal, this space supports it all. Comfort in Every Room of the 5-Bedroom Smart Home Each of the five bedrooms feels like a personal retreat. They feature spa-inspired bathrooms , high ceilings , mood lighting , and built-in wardrobes . These rooms offer both privacy and comfort for family and guests. This 5-Bedroom Smart Home Offers More Than Living Space Beyond the essentials, this home delivers features that enhance everyday life. A private elevator connects all floors with ease. There’s a fully equipped gym for your daily workouts and a cinema room with acoustic treatment for late-night movies or big game nights. You’ll also find a private salon suite —ideal for grooming sessions without stepping outside. Relaxation Built In: Spa, Jacuzzi, and Pool Wellness is at the heart of this 5-bedroom smart home. It features a spa room with a jacuzzi and sauna , offering a peaceful escape any day of the week. Step outside and enjoy a tranquil pool with a waterfall feature . The sound of falling water, paired with lush landscaping, adds a peaceful rhythm to outdoor life. Always Bright, Always Comfortable Thanks to skylight roofing , the home stays naturally lit throughout the day. Light pours into every corner, creating a fresh, energizing atmosphere. For climate control, a central air conditioning system ensures consistent comfort in every room. Support and Privacy: 2 Staff Quarters Included The home includes two dedicated staff quarters , finished to match the main house in quality. These quarters provide additional support without disrupting your privacy.household needs to be handled without disrupting your privacy or flow. Why This 5-Bedroom Smart Home is a Strong Choice This isn’t just a house—it’s a smart investment, a wellness-focused space, and a beautiful place to call home. Need help making a decision? Contact us to schedule a private tour. Want to explore more listings? Visit our featured properties page . Priced at $3.5 million (just over ₦5 billion), this home is crafted by the same visionary developer behind Wizkid’s iconic Ikoyi residence, taking exclusivity and grandeur to a whole new level. Every element of this mansion embodies sophistication, from its breathtaking exterior to its thoughtfully curated interiors. The architectural brilliance is evident the moment you arrive, with striking Turkish doors, exquisite Italian marbles, statement chandeliers, and premium decorative panels that enhance the home’s lavish appeal. The outdoor space is a sanctuary of tranquility, featuring a beautifully designed swimming pool with a fountain, offering the perfect retreat for relaxation. Step inside, and you’re welcomed into a world of luxury, where a grand piano and a temperature-controlled wine wall set the tone for a refined lifestyle. The state-of-the-art dry and wet kitchen is a masterpiece on its own, blending functionality with high-end aesthetics. Designed to cater to culinary enthusiasts, it offers an exceptional cooking experience with top-of-the-line appliances and impeccable finishes. Entertainment and leisure take center stage in this home, with a dedicated game room and a cutting-edge Virtual Reality room that redefine modern amusement. The private cinema offers an immersive experience, while the in-house beauty salon ensures a five-star luxury living experience at your fingertips. To enhance convenience, the mansion boasts a private elevator, providing seamless access across all floors. The two primary suites are a haven of serenity, offering expansive space, exquisite detailing, and unparalleled comfort. Situated in one of Nigeria’s most exclusive neighborhoods, this Ikoyi mansion places you at the heart of luxury living. Known for its prestige, security, and proximity to high-value real estate, Ikoyi is the preferred address for discerning homeowners and investors. With a track record of delivering some of the most spectacular homes in Lagos, this developer continues to redefine luxury with this exceptional residence. Price: $3.5 Million (₦5 Billion+) Location: Ikoyi, Lagos This is more than just a home—it’s a statement of class, elegance, and unparalleled prestige. Schedule a private viewing today and step into a world of absolute luxury. description: Description An Architectural Masterpiece – 6-Bedroom Ultra-Luxury Mansion in Ikoyi Introducing an extraordinary luxury residence in the heart of Ikoyi, Lagos—an opulent six-bedroom mansion meticulously designed for the elite. Priced at $3.5 million (just over ₦5 billion), this home is crafted by the same visionary developer behind Wizkid’s iconic Ikoyi residence, taking exclusivity and grandeur to a whole new level. Every element of this mansion embodies sophistication, from its breathtaking exterior to its thoughtfully curated interiors. The architectural brilliance is evident the moment you arrive, with striking Turkish doors, exquisite Italian marbles, statement chandeliers, and premium decorative panels that enhance the home’s lavish appeal. The outdoor space is a sanctuary of tranquility, featuring a beautifully designed swimming pool with a fountain, offering the perfect retreat for relaxation. Step inside, and you’re welcomed into a world of luxury, where a grand piano and a temperature-controlled wine wall set the tone for a refined lifestyle. The state-of-the-art dry and wet kitchen is a masterpiece on its own, blending functionality with high-end aesthetics. Designed to cater to culinary enthusiasts, it offers an exceptional cooking experience with top-of-the-line appliances and impeccable finishes. Entertainment and leisure take center stage in this home, with a dedicated game room and a cutting-edge Virtual Reality room that redefine modern amusement. The private cinema offers an immersive experience, while the in-house beauty salon ensures a five-star luxury living experience at your fingertips. To enhance convenience, the mansion boasts a private elevator, providing seamless access across all floors. The two primary suites are a haven of serenity, offering expansive space, exquisite detailing, and unparalleled comfort. Situated in one of Nigeria’s most exclusive neighborhoods, this Ikoyi mansion places you at the heart of luxury living. Known for its p

Priced at ₦900 million (approx. $600K), this smart 5-bedroom home is a two-storey masterpiece designed for those who value space, style, and detail. From the welcoming anteroom to the expansive living room with bold lighting and clean architectural lines, this home immediately sets a tone of sophistication. The interiors are thoughtfully laid out and finished with top-grade materials. AFFORDABLE LUXURY AFFORDABLE prestine luxury elegant Designed for Comfort & Lifestyle This residence features both a wet and dry kitchen , perfect for hosting and daily use. Whether you’re preparing a quiet meal or entertaining guests, these spaces are built to handle it all with ease. Each of the five ensuite bedrooms offers space, privacy, and natural light. The primary suite stands out with its own private kitchenette , dedicated study , and a walk-in closet large enough to serve as a dressing wing. There’s also a separate guest room and a boys’ quarters (BQ) for staff or additional utility space. Entertainment & Outdoor Living A private swimming pool and outdoor terrace create the perfect setting for weekends, family time, or social events. Inside, a fully equipped home cinema brings entertainment home — ideal for movie nights or game days. Premium Estate Features This home is located in a secure, gated estate in the heart of Lekki. It’s protected with 24-hour security and surveillance , offering residents privacy, peace, and convenience. You’re also minutes from top schools, dining spots, and major commercial hubs, with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi. description: Description 5-Bedroom Smart Home in Lekki with Cinema & Private Pool – ₦900M Step inside one of the most impressive residences in Lekki — a home that speaks of refinement, function, and comfort at every turn. Priced at ₦900 million (approx. $600K), this smart 5-bedroom home is a two-storey masterpiece designed for those who value space, style, and detail. From the welcoming anteroom to the expansive living room with bold lighting and clean architectural lines, this home immediately sets a tone of sophistication. The interiors are thoughtfully laid out and finished with top-grade materials. AFFORDABLE LUXURY AFFORDABLE prestine luxury elegant Designed for Comfort & Lifestyle This residence features both a wet and dry kitchen , perfect for hosting and daily use. Whether you’re preparing a quiet meal or entertaining guests, these spaces are built to handle it all with ease. Each of the five ensuite bedrooms offers space, privacy, and natural light. The primary suite stands out with its own private kitchenette , dedicated study , and a walk-in closet large enough to serve as a dressing wing. There’s also a separate guest room and a boys’ quarters (BQ) for staff or additional utility space. Entertainment & Outdoor Living A private swimming pool and outdoor terrace create the perfect setting for weekends, family time, or social events. Inside, a fully equipped home cinema brings entertainment home — ideal for movie nights or game days. Premium Estate Features This home is located in a secure, gated estate in the heart of Lekki. It’s protected with 24-hour security and surveillance , offering residents privacy, peace, and convenience. You’re also minutes from top schools, dining spots, and major commercial hubs, with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi. Key Features At a Glance 5 ensuite bedrooms + guest room Boys’ quarters (BQ) Dry and wet kitchen setup Private swimming pool and outdoor terrace Home cinema Primary suite with kitchenette, study & walk-in closet Ample

land_size: Luxury 5-Bedroom Penthouse with Cinema & Pool in Victoria Island, Lagos - Eden Oasis Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast +2348092949777 Description Features Address Video Reviews Similar Listings Home Penthouse Luxury 5-Bedroom Penthouse with Cinema & Pool in Victoria Island, Lagos WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email Luxury 5-Bedroom Penthouse with Cinema & Pool in Victoria Island, Lagos Available upon request Ready To Move In Sold Victoria Island, Lagos 36 33 More Penthouse Property Type 5 Bedrooms 5.5 Bathrooms 2024 Year Built WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email Ready To Move In Sold Luxury 5-Bedroom Penthouse with Cinema & Pool in Victoria Island, Lagos Victoria Island, Lagos Available upon request Description 5-Bedroom Penthouse Victoria Island Lagos This 5-bedroom detached house in Chevron Toll, Lekki offers the perfect mix of elegance, comfort, and prime location. Newly built and move-in ready, it is designed for families and individuals who value space, privacy, and functionality. From the moment you arrive, the home’s modern architecture and clean finishing stand out. Inside, the living area features POP ceilings , recessed LED lighting , and an open layout that flows naturally from one space to another. AFFORDABLE LUXURY AFFORDABLE prestine luxury elegant Spacious, Well-Appointed Interiors Designed for You Every inch of this penthouse reflects thoughtful design. All five bedrooms are ensuite, ensuring privacy and comfort for each resident. The 4.5 bathrooms are fitted with high-quality fixtures that bring a sense of sophistication to everyday living. The fully fitted kitchen is designed for functionality and style, featuring modern cabinetry, premium countertops, and top-grade appliances. POP ceilings with recessed LED lighting set a refined tone, while expansive balconies extend your living space outdoors—ideal for enjoying serene views of the city skyline. Ample closets throughout ensure that your home remains uncluttered and elegant. Amenities That Elevate Everyday Living This penthouse goes beyond the expected, offering premium features that enhance comfort and leisure: Private cinema for immersive entertainment Swimming pool for relaxation and recreation Boys’ Quarters (BQ) for added convenience Reliable and constant power supply Secure access road and ample parking space Portable water system for uninterrupted daily use Contemporary bathrooms with modern fittings Stamped concrete flooring and quality finishes throughout Prime Location: The Victoria Island Advantage Victoria Island is Lagos’s premier address, renowned for its mix of corporate hubs, luxury residences, fine dining, and vibrant nightlife. Owning a penthouse here places you at the center of it all: Quick access to Ikoyi and Lekki for business or leisure Surrounded by top schools, embassies, and lifestyle hubs Close proximity to malls, restaurants, and cultural attractions High rental demand from corporate executives and expatriates Why This Penthouse Is a Smart Investment This property isn’t just a luxury home—it’s a profitable asset . Victoria Island real estate continues to appreciate, fueled by strong rental demand and limited supply of luxury residences. Whether you’re purchasing as your forever home, a vacation retreat, or an investment, this penthouse promises long-term value and consistent returns . Schedule Your Private Viewing Today Step into a new level of luxury living with this 5-bedroom Victoria Island penthouse . Contact Eden Oasis Realty to book your exclusive tour and secure your place among Lagos’s most privileged homeowners. description: Description 5-Bedroom Penthouse Victoria Island Lagos This 5-bedroom detached house in Chevron Toll, Lekki offers the perfect mix of elegance, comfort, and prime location. Newly built and move-in ready, it is designed for families and individuals who value space, privacy, and functionality. From the moment you arrive, the home’s modern architecture and clean finishing stand out. Inside, the living area features POP ceilings , recessed LED lighting , and an open layout that flows naturally from one space to another. AFFORDABLE LUXURY AFFORDABLE prestine luxury elegant Spacious, Well-Appointed Interiors Designed for You Every inch of this penthouse reflects thoughtful design. All five bedrooms are ensuite, ensuring privacy and comfort for each resident. The 4.5 bathrooms are fitted with high-quality fixtures that bring a sense of sophistication to everyday living. The fully fitted kitchen is designed for functionality and style, featuring modern cabinetry, premium countertops, and top-grade appliances. POP ceilings with recessed LED lighting set a refined tone, while expansive balconies extend your living space outdoors—ideal for enjoying serene views of the city skyline. Ample closets throughout ensure that your home remains uncluttered and elegant. Amenities That Elevate Everyday Living This penthouse goes beyond the expected, offering premium features that enhance comfort and leisure: Private cinema for immersive entertainment Swimming pool for relaxation and recreation Boys’ Quarters (BQ) for added convenience Reliable and constant power supply Secure access road and ample parking space Portable water system for uninterrupted daily use Contemporary bathrooms with modern fittings Stamped concrete flooring and quality finishes throughout Prime Location: The Victoria Island Advantage Victoria Island is Lagos’s premier address, renowned for its mix of corporate hubs, luxury residences, fine dining, and vibrant nightlife. description: Description Your Modern Home Awaits at Citadel Views 1.0 Phase 2 Welcome to a stunning new development where comfort, style, and convenience come together. Citadel Views 1.0 Phase 2 is perfectly located in Lekki Scheme II, one of Lagos’ most promising residential hubs. Designed for families, investors, and young professionals, this 3-bedroom terrace duplex is a smart choice for modern living. A Home Built for Everyday Comfort Step inside and you’re greeted by a spacious living area with clean POP ceilings and recessed LED lighting that create a warm, welcoming feel. The fully fitted kitchen comes with premium cabinetry, sleek countertops, and ample storage, making it both stylish and practical. Every bedroom is ensuite, complete with fitted wardrobes and elegant bathrooms. Large windows fill each room with natural light, while balconies provide refreshing outdoor views. This is a home that balances privacy with openness. Modern Amenities for a Better Lifestyle Life at Citadel Views Phase 2 goes beyond the walls of your home. The estate features: Steady power supply for uninterrupted living Clean, portable water Well-paved access roads and stamped concrete flooring Secure environment designed for peace of mind Why Choose Citadel Views 1.0 Phase 2? Located in Lekki Scheme II, this development offers both lifestyle and investment value. The area is growing rapidly, with rising demand for residential properties, making it a strong choice for investors. Families will enjoy the serene environment, while professionals benefit from proximity to Lekki’s business districts and major landmarks. A Smart Investment in Lagos Real Estate With modern architecture, high-quality finishes, and a prime location, Citadel Views 1.0 Phase 2 is more than just a home — it’s an investment in your future. Whether you’re buying to live in or to earn returns from shortlet or rental opportunities, this property delivers long-term value.

land_size: Brum Height 7 – Exclusive Smart 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 - Eden Oasis Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast Home Listings About Contact Inquiry Form FAQ Podcast +2348092949777 Description Address Features Video Details Floor Plans Schedule a Tour Contact Reviews Similar Listings Home Apartment Maisonette Brum Height 7 – Exclusive Smart 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email Brum Height 7 – Exclusive Smart 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 ₦ 250,000,000 Featured Off Plan Project Hot Offer Lekki Phase 1 14 11 More Apartment, Maisonette Property Type 2 Bedrooms 2.5 Bathrooms WhatsApp Pinterest Facebook Twitter Linkedin Email Featured Off Plan Project Hot Offer Brum Height 7 – Exclusive Smart 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 Lekki Phase 1 ₦ 250,000,000 Description Brum Height 7 – 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 Brum Height 7 is a landmark development in Lekki Phase 1 , one of Lagos’ most prestigious and in-demand neighborhoods. Perfectly positioned in a prime location, this development offers modern 2-bedroom apartments designed for both stylish living and profitable shortlet investment. With Lekki Phase 1 ranking as the second most sought-after area for shortlets in Lagos , owning a home here is more than a lifestyle choice—it’s a smart investment move. Why Brum Height 7 Stands Out This project delivers a rare mix of cutting-edge design, everyday comfort, and world-class amenities . From its sleek architecture to its modern interiors, every detail has been carefully curated. Prime location with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi Perfect for investors with rising shortlet demand Contemporary finishes and functional layouts Smart home features for convenience and security Payment Options Made Simple Outright Purchase – ₦250M 6-Month Plan – ₦280M (Pay 20% and spread balance till December 2025) Off-Plan Purchase Available – Delivery by November 2025 Legal Title Each apartment comes with Governor’s Consent , guaranteeing secure ownership. A Home & Investment in One Whether you’re buying to live in or to rent out as a shortlet, Brum Height 7 offers the best of both worlds. Its prime Lekki Phase 1 location , coupled with high-quality construction and thoughtful design, ensures strong long-term value. This isn’t just an apartment—it’s a lifestyle opportunity in the heart of Lagos. description: Description Brum Height 7 – 2-Bedroom Apartment in Lekki Phase 1 Brum Height 7 is a landmark development in Lekki Phase 1 , one of Lagos’ most prestigious and in-demand neighborhoods. Perfectly positioned in a prime location, this development offers modern 2-bedroom apartments designed for both stylish living and profitable shortlet investment. With Lekki Phase 1 ranking as the second most sought-after area for shortlets in Lagos , owning a home here is more than a lifestyle choice—it’s a smart investment move. Why Brum Height 7 Stands Out This project delivers a rare mix of cutting-edge design, everyday comfort, and world-class amenities . From its sleek architecture to its modern interiors, every detail has been carefully curated. Prime location with easy access to Victoria Island and Ikoyi Perfect for investors with rising shortlet demand Contemporary finishes and functional layouts Smart home features for convenience and security Payment Options Made Simple Outright Purchase – ₦250M 6-Month Plan – ₦280M (Pay 20% and spread balance till December 2025) Off-Plan Purchase Available – Delivery by November 2025 Legal Title Each apartment comes with Governor’s Consent , guaranteeing secure ownership. A Home & Investment in One Whether you’re buying to live in or to rent out as a shortlet, Brum Height 7 offers the best of both worlds. Its prime Lekki Phase 1 location , coupled with high-quality construction and thoughtful design, ensures strong long-term value. This isn’t just an apartment—it’s a lifestyle opportunity in the heart of Lagos. Location Advantages 5 minutes to Victoria Island 10 minutes to Ikoyi Close to shopping malls, restaurants, lounges, and business hubs

Perfectly suited for discerning homeowners and investors alike, this residence sets a new standard for elegance and convenience in Lagos. Spacious, Well-Appointed Interiors Designed for You Step into a spacious 2-bedroom apartment where every detail has been carefully crafted. All rooms are ensuite, offering privacy and comfort with modern bathroom fixtures and quality finishes. The POP ceilings add a touch of sophistication while recessed LED lighting creates a warm, inviting ambiance throughout the home. The fully fitted kitchen is a chef’s delight, equipped with premium cabinetry, sleek countertops, and modern appliances that make cooking a pleasure. Adjacent to the kitchen, private balconies extend your living space outdoors, offering serene views and natural ventilation. Large closets provide ample storage, keeping your living areas clutter-free and elegant. Amenities That Elevate Everyday Living This apartment goes beyond the basics, providing premium amenities that ensure comfort and convenience: Reliable and constant power supply, eliminating downtime Portable water system for uninterrupted daily needs Spacious private balconies perfect for relaxation or entertaining Contemporary bathrooms with high-end fixtures and fittings Secure access and well-maintained surroundings ensuring peace of mind Prime Location: The Ologolo Advantage Ologolo is strategically positioned between Lekki Phase 1 and the Lekki-Epe Expressway, making it an ideal base for easy commuting to Lagos’ major business districts, schools, shopping malls, and recreational spots. Residents enjoy a peaceful environment away from the city’s hustle while staying connected to its vibrant energy. Only minutes from Lekki Phase 1 and Victoria Island Smooth access to Lekki-Epe Expressway for effortless travel Close proximity to key amenities and lifestyle hubs Why This Ologolo Luxury Apartment Is a Smart Investment This property stands out not just for its luxurious finishes but also for its exceptional investment potential. The Lekki corridor is experiencing rapid growth, driving strong rental demand and steady appreciation in property values. Whether you seek a stylish home or a profitable asset, this apartment promises long-term value. Schedule Your Private Viewing Today Experience firsthand the elegance and comfort of this ologolo luxury apartment . Contact Eden Oasis to book your exclusive tour and take the next step toward owning a premier property in one of Lagos’ most sought-after neighborhoods. description: Description Nestled in the tranquil yet accessible neighborhood of Ologolo, Lekki, this newly built ologolo luxury apartment offers a refined living experience that balances contemporary architecture with thoughtful design. Perfectly suited for discerning homeowners and investors alike, this residence sets a new standard for elegance and convenience in Lagos. Spacious, Well-Appointed Interiors Designed for You Step into a spacious 2-bedroom apartment where every detail has been carefully crafted. All rooms are ensuite, offering privacy and comfort with modern bathroom fixtures and quality finishes. The POP ceilings add a touch of sophistication while recessed LED lighting creates a warm, inviting ambiance throughout the home. The fully fitted kitchen is a chef’s delight, equipped with premium cabinetry, sleek countertops, and modern appliances that make cooking a pleasure. Adjacent to the kitchen, private balconies extend your living space outdoors, offering serene views and natural ventilation. Large closets provide ample storage, keeping your living areas clutter-free and elegant. Amenities That Elevate Everyday Living This apartment goes beyond the basics, providing premium amenities that ensure comfort and convenience: Reliable and constant power supply, eliminating downtime Portable water system for uninterrupted daily needs Spacious private balconies perfect for relaxation or entertaining Contemporary bathrooms with high-end fixtures and fittings Secure access and well-maintained surroundings ensuring peace of mind Prime Location: The Ologolo Advantage Ologolo is strategically positioned between Lekki Phase 1 and the Lekki-Epe Expressway, making it an ideal base for easy commuting to Lagos’ major business districts, schools, shopping malls, and recreational spots. Residents enjoy a peaceful environment away from the city’s hustle while staying connected to its vibrant energy. Only minutes from Lekki Phase 1 and Victoria Island Smooth access to Lekki-Epe Expres
